column4: Hi - how do I edit Grub 2's settings to make the menu delay shorter?
set timeout in /boot/grub/grub.cfg. that's what you need i guess.
there's a fairly giant "DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE" comment at the top... is there somewhere I'm supposed to edit?
back up the grub.cfg JUST IN CASE. and there's a set timeout=10. Think that's what you need to edit.
